content: deisred length ending on a rs row with right sides of strap and bag together single_crochet strap end to bag working into marked stitch on bag being careful not to twist strap single_crochet to beginning of row join w/ sl to first single_crochet finish off and weave in ends cinch belt chain 150 slip stich in each chain across finish off and weave in ends weave cinch belt through top double_crochet row on bag working over and under at 2 stitch intervals tie a knot in each end of cinch belt go shopping
